original: @107b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @107b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ma ni dv'i pa ma h'a k'a ru ni ka de ba panytsa sto tra /
analyzed: ma ni dv'i pa ma h'a k'a ru ni ka de ba panytsa sto tra /
translated: Manidvipa Mahakarunikadevapa√±castautram

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga la bstod pa /
analyzed: nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga la bstod pa /
translated: Praise to the Five Deities of the Great Compassionate One of the Jewel Island

original: rje btsun spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the venerable Avalokiteshvara.

original: nor bu'i gling du thugs rje'i sku 'khrungs dpal ldan padma'i rigs //
analyzed: nor bu'i gling du thugs rje'i sku 'khrungs dpal ldan padma'i rigs //
translated: Born in the Jewel Island as the embodiment of compassion, glorious lotus family,

original: ri rgyal po ta la yi rin chen brag phug nyams dga' bar //
analyzed: ri rgyal po ta la yi rin chen brag phug nyams dga' bar //
translated: In the delightful jeweled cave of Mount Potala,

original: pad zla'i dbus na thugs rje'i sku ni 'gying zhing rol pa'i nyams //
analyzed: pad zla'i dbus na thugs rje'i sku ni 'gying zhing rol pa'i nyams //
translated: In the center of a lotus and moon, the embodiment of compassion, majestic and playful,

original: thugs rje'i sman gyis bdag nad gso ba mgon po thugs rje can //
analyzed: thugs rje'i sman gyis bdag nad gso ba mgon po thugs rje can //
translated: With the medicine of compassion, the protector with great compassion heals my illness.

original: ma rig thibs po 'gro ba'i mun sel rje btsun rab rib sel //
analyzed: ma rig thibs po 'gro ba'i mun sel rje btsun rab rib sel //
translated: Dispelling the darkness of beings in the thick darkness of ignorance, the venerable one removes blindness.

original: skye rga na 'chi thar dka' yang srid rtsibs drug 'khor lor chud //
analyzed: skye rga na 'chi thar dka' yang srid rtsibs drug 'khor lor chud //
translated: Birth, aging, sickness, and death are difficult to escape, caught in the six-spoked wheel of existence.

original: srid pa'i 'khrul 'khor bzlog dka' sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'khrul 'khor bzlog dka' sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying //
translated: Difficult to reverse the machine of existence, beings are submerged in the ocean of samsara.

original: mgon po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad thugs rje'i sku yis sgrol //
analyzed: mgon po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad thugs rje'i sku yis sgrol //
translated: I pay homage to the Lord who turns the wheel of Dharma, who is the body of compassion, and who is the savior.

original: zla ba ltar dkar phyag gnyis padma gdung ba sel ba'i phyag / dpag med cod pan rin chen mdzes brgyan gzhon nu zhi ba'i sku //
analyzed: zla ba ltar dkar phyag gnyis padma gdung ba sel ba'i phyag / dpag med cod pan rin chen mdzes brgyan gzhon nu zhi ba'i sku //
translated: With a body as white as the moon, with two hands, and with a lotus that removes the torment of passion, with a crown of immeasurable [buddhas], adorned with beautiful jewels, with a youthful and peaceful body,

original: thugs rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis zug rngu'i nad dang sdug bsngal sel //
analyzed: thugs rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis zug rngu'i nad dang sdug bsngal sel //
translated: with a stream of the nectar of compassion, you remove the pain of illness and suffering.

original: thugs rje ri dvags lpags 'dzin srid pa'i bla ma phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thugs rje ri dvags lpags 'dzin srid pa'i bla ma phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the guru of existence, who wears the skin of compassion.

original: thugs rje'i thugs gdungs spyan g-yas chab las lha mo thugs rje'i sku //
analyzed: thugs rje'i thugs gdungs spyan g-yas chab las lha mo thugs rje'i sku //
translated: From the tears of compassion in the right eye of the compassionate one, the beautiful goddess Tara arose.

original: yid 'ong sgrol ma ljang ser bde ma rin chen rgyan mdzes sgeg / padmo'i sku la phyag mtshan autpala kha 'byed phyag gnyis kyis //
analyzed: yid 'ong sgrol ma ljang ser bde ma rin chen rgyan mdzes sgeg / padmo'i sku la phyag mtshan autpala kha 'byed phyag gnyis kyis //
translated: With a delightful green and yellow body, a beautiful jeweled necklace, with two hands holding an open blue lotus on a lotus,

original: bcud rgyas nu mas gso mdzad 'gro ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcud rgyas nu mas gso mdzad 'gro ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: nourishing with full breasts, I pay homage to the mother of the world.

original: sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas snying rje'i chu las mdzes ma 'khrungs //
analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas snying rje'i chu las mdzes ma 'khrungs //
translated: Seeing the suffering of sentient beings, the beautiful one arose from the water of compassion.

original: khro gnyer zhi ba ser mo rin chen sku brgyan thugs rjes 'gying //
analyzed: khro gnyer zhi ba ser mo rin chen sku brgyan thugs rjes 'gying //
translated: The yellow one, with a peaceful frown, is adorned with jewels, and is majestic with compassion.

original: rje btsun mgon gzigs phyag mtshan gus pa'i phyag rgya dbyug pa bsnams //
analyzed: rje btsun mgon gzigs phyag mtshan gus pa'i phyag rgya dbyug pa bsnams //
translated: The protector Avalokite≈õvara holds a staff in the gesture of homage.

original: mchog sbyin bum chus 'gro ba'i re skong yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mchog sbyin bum chus 'gro ba'i re skong yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the mother who grants the supreme gift and fulfills the hopes of beings with the water of the vase.

original: thugs rjes phrin las dregs pa tshar dbang mdzad khro rgyal sku //
analyzed: thugs rjes phrin las dregs pa tshar dbang mdzad khro rgyal sku //
translated: The wrathful king's form is the one who acts with compassion to tame the arrogant.

original: sprul brgyan 'od dmar rta gdong ljang gu spyi bor rta skad bzhad //
analyzed: sprul brgyan 'od dmar rta gdong ljang gu spyi bor rta skad bzhad //
translated: He is adorned with emanations, red light, and a green horse face, neighing at the crown.

original: mgon po pa ne la 'dud pus btsugs rdo rje dbyug pa bsnams //
analyzed: mgon po pa ne la 'dud pus btsugs rdo rje dbyug pa bsnams //
translated: The protector kneels with folded hands, holding a vajra and staff.

original: padma'i rigs sprul thugs rje'i brlan gyis sgeg khro phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: padma'i rigs sprul thugs rje'i brlan gyis sgeg khro phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage with folded hands to the one who emanates from the lotus family, playful with compassion.

original: phyag na padma'i drung na dam chos @108a * //
analyzed: phyag na padma'i drung na dam chos @108a * //
translated: In the presence of PadmapƒÅ·πái,

original: nyer zhu tshong dpon bu //
analyzed: nyer zhu tshong dpon bu //
translated: the merchant's sonüîΩS≈´ryara≈õmi,

original: nor bzangs sras po gser mdog skal ldan nyid bzhugs rin chen brgyan //
analyzed: nor bzangs sras po gser mdog skal ldan nyid bzhugs rin chen brgyan //
translated: the fortunate one himself, sits adorned with jewels.

original: ae ma bla ma la gus thal sbyar pus btsugs pu sti bsnams //
analyzed: ae ma bla ma la gus thal sbyar pus btsugs pu sti bsnams //
translated: Ema! With folded hands, kneeling, holding a book, devoted to the guru,

original: bzhin bzangs khye'u dad ldan nor bzangs bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bzhin bzangs khye'u dad ldan nor bzangs bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Good sir, I pay homage to the son of Sudhana, the faithful one.

original: rje btsun gsung gi dbang phyug kharsa p'a ni 'khor bcas la //
analyzed: rje btsun gsung gi dbang phyug kharsa p'a ni 'khor bcas la //
translated: To the venerable lord of speech, the glorious Atisha, and his retinue,

original: bdag gis gus par bstod bgyis zla ltar dge ba dri med des //
analyzed: bdag gis gus par bstod bgyis zla ltar dge ba dri med des //
translated: I offer this praise with devotion, like the moon, virtuous and stainless.

original: srid mtsho skems shing thugs rje'i chu yis skye 'gro kun ngoms nas //
analyzed: srid mtsho skems shing thugs rje'i chu yis skye 'gro kun ngoms nas //
translated: May it dry up the ocean of existence, and with the water of compassion, satisfy all beings.

original: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga' po ta la ru skye bar shog / sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga' po ta la ru skye bar shog / sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa //
translated: May I be born in the delightful mandala of the Victorious One, the Potala.

original: thub pa rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yis //
analyzed: thub pa rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yis //
translated: By this praise of the Victorious One, the Sage, the chief of beings,

original: bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus kun //
analyzed: bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus kun //
translated: Whatever merit I have thereby, may all beings here, without exception,üîΩAttain the supreme jewel of enlightenment, peace and bliss.

original: byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog / nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i bstod pa //
analyzed: byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog / nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i bstod pa //
translated: The praise of the five deities of great compassion from the island of jewels,

original: slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: composed by the master A≈õvagho·π£a, is complete.
